requirements.description: Left thumb impression on white paper with black or blue ink
requirements.importantInfo: Left thumb impression must be on white paper with black or blue ink.

requirements.label: Hand Written Declaration
requirements.description: The handwritten declaration has to be in the candidate’s hand writing and in English only. The text should NOT BE IN CAPITAL LETTERS. If it is written by anybody else and uploaded or in any other language, the application will be considered as invalid.
requirements.importantInfo: The text for handwritten declaration is as follows: "I, __________ (Name of the candidate), hereby declare that all the information submitted by me in the application form is correct, true and valid. I will present the supporting documents as and when required."
